title: Jenkins security advisory (AV25-183)
description: On April 2, 2025, Jenkins published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Cadence vManager Plugin   version 4.0.0-282.v5096a_c2db_275 and prior
Simple Queue Plugin   version 1.4.6 and prior
Stack Hammer Plugin   version 1.0.6 and prior
Templating Engine Plugin   version 2.5.3 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
